text: allāh oru cantatiyai ēṟpaṭuttik koṇṭāṉ eṉṟu avarkaḷ colkiṟārkaḷ; (avarkaḷiṉ ikkaṟpaṉaiyai viṭṭum) allāh mikattūymaiyāṉavaṉ; avaṉ evvitat tēvaiyumillātavaṉ. Vāṉaṅkaḷiluḷḷavaiyum, pūmiyiluḷḷavaiyum yāvum avaṉukkē uriyaṉ (eṉavē avaṉ cantati ēṟpaṭuttik koṇṭāṉ eṉpataṟku) uṅkaḷiṭam itaṟku enta ātāramum illai; nīṅkaḷ aṟiyātatai allāhviṉ mītu (ivvāṟu poyyākak) kūṟukiṟīrkaḷā
